attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is totally unaccepteable behaviour for a man and his MP colleagues, who are elected by the people to serve the people and not to 'rip them off' at every end and turn!
They are elected to these positions of trust by the electorate and shoud be fully accountable to the electorate and if they can no longer be trusted, because of a misdeamnour, then they should be sacked forthwith as they are no longer fit to govern this wonderful country of ours!
